note.p: German socialist. As a boy, boarded with Ludwig Büchner. Publisher of the socialist periodicals Die Zukunft and Jahrbuch der Socialwissenschaft und Socialpolitik. Went to Switzerland in 1878, at first for his health, later because he was exiled by anti-socialist laws in Germany. Published under the pseudonyms R. F. Seyffert and Ludwig Richter.
